MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety in the  LL15 postcode area of Ruthin following reports of grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:50 on 26th December 2020
